response.overview: Experience true terror you've never experienced before... The shocking footage of "Ghost Interview" was broadcast on a certain broadband network and caused a stir across Japan. However, it was a cover-up of the real horror... A ghost was summoned by the secret relationship between the reporter and the director. The truth will amplify your fear and close in on you. The shocking footage recorded on the exclusive original interview tapes. Over 30 minutes of unreleased footage will send shivers down your spine.
response.title: Ghost interview
